Breakfast Coding Club (TGIF!)

22 May 2015

It’s Friday, and there’s a Breakfast Coding Club. We’re doing Caffe Bene again. Mark did a great job of holding the fort down (just kidding, there’s not many up that early here.) Brian dropped by for breakfast. Diana is getting some relaxing coding done before her PhD defense (good luck!) Evie graced us with her presence. Kat came straight from the club to the breakfastcodingclub. I will get some python tests going.

#tgif #breakfastcodingclub

A photo posted by @andrewleung77 on May 22, 2015 at 6:14am PDT

Have a great weekend (and if you’re in the US, Memorial Day weekend!)
